S.FORM: Slovakia kakilimaan u Slovakia sa i labu nu O cuo, itiza i 48 40 N, 19 30 E. u ahebal nu lala' mapulung sa izaw ku 49,035 km2.u ahebal nu lala'ay sa izaw ku 48,105 km2, u ahebal nu nanumay sa izaw ku 930 km2. hamin nu tademawan sa 5,445,802. kakalukan umah sa 40.10 , kilakilangan umah sa 40.20 , zumaay henay umah sa 19.70 . nilacul tapang tusu nu kanatal u tapang tusu nu kanatal sa u Bratislava . kakinginan nu kanatal demiad kakinging nu kanatal demiad sa 1 bulad 9 demiad. tabakiay a tapang nu kanatal u tabakiay a tapang nu kanatal (congtung) ayza sa ci Zuzana aputov√° (Susanna Caputuwa ), 1973 a mihca 6 a bulad 21 a demiad nalecuhan. u tabakiay a tapang nu kanatal (congtung) nu Slovakia ayza, micakat a demiad sa i 2019 a mihca 6 bulad 15 demiad. cunli u cunli nu Slovakia ayza sa ci Eduard Heger , micakat a demiad sa i 2021 a mihcaan 4 bulad 1 demiad. Czechoslovakia likisi 1918 1992 . Czechoslovakia i cacay a malebut siwa a lasubu cacay a bataan idaw ku walu (1918) a mihcaan katukuh i cacay a malebut siwa a lasubu siwa a bataan idaw ku tusa (1992) a mahcaan u O cuo a kanatal, mabulesak satu tahekl ku tusaay misitekeday a kanatal Czechia atu Czechoslovakia . 1918 . Czechoslovakia patideng i cacay a malebut siwa a lasubu cacay a bataan idaw ku walu (1918) a mihcaan, itida i Cuo o , u Czechia atu Slovakia misakaput, tawyaay a kanatal nu ngangan u Slovensko , itini i cacay katukuh tu tusaay a nikalepacawan, tawya namaka celcel henay tu saka kitakit nu saka pitu a tabakiay nu kakakulian. . itini i saka tusa anikalepacawan, Czechoslovakia a niyadu hiyan nu Nacuy Dekuo midebung, itin i kakakuliyana nu kakitidaan patideng tu Bohemia atu Moravia dadiputen a kanatal atu Czechoslovakia nu tusaay a dadadimawan nu kanatal, duma a niyaduan hiyan nu Poland atu Hungary amikelic. 1960 . cacay a malebut siwa a lasubu enem a bataan (1960) a mihcaan,Czechoslovakia misumad tu ngangan u Czechoslovakia siakay cui kunhekuo. sumamadan a likisi 300 1867 . Czechoslovakia a niyadu' itida i Ocuo nu teban, pisitekedan sa nuheni nama hiya nu Hapu sepaw wancaw patidenga tu Awtili tikuo mikuwan makala tu tulu a pina (300) a lasubu ku tenes, cacay a malebut walu a lasubu enem a bataan idaw ku pitu (1867) a mihcaan Awtlli tikuo misumad tu kaput mala Aw'cun tikuo , Czechia atu Slovakia niyadu' mikelic sipabeli i Austria atu Hungary . 1918 , . cacay a malebut siwa a lasubu cacay a bataan idaw ku walu (1918) a mihcaan misatadas malepacaw tu hedek, Awcun tikuo mademec mabulasak, Bohemia , Moravia , Slovakia a niyadu' misakaput misitekeday a kanatal, pangangan han u Czechoslovakia . . misiteked satu kina kitakit, Czechoslovakia a sakaudip amelik satu mucelak, katukuh tu tusa anikalepacawan nu kanatal a ayawan, naytini i paykanatal nu saka cacay a bataan nu kakakulian a saka enem nu kasinganganan. 1938 . cacay a malebut siwa a lasubu tulu a bataan idaw ku walu (1938) a mihcaan, Ing fa a kanatal atu Germany atu Italy masasulit tu Munich a kiyakuan a sasulitan, itini kainaian nu Czechoslovakia dayhiw milihida tu kawaw panutek tu nutipanay a lala' Sudetenland kelicen sipabeli i Germany . 1939 3 . cacay a malebut siwa a lasubu tulu a bataan idaw ku siwa (1939) a mihcaan tulu a bulad, Nazi Germany maalatu Sudetenland aniyadu nu likucu, tahekal ku hitay hamin han ku Czechoslovakia mialaw, Germany itini i Czechia patideng tu Bohemia atu Moravia madiputay a kanatal, Slovakia mapatideng mahiya nu Germany madiputay a Czechoslovakia . . Slovakia a niyadu' pakilac sipabeli i Germany a cabay tu Hungary wan kuo . 1945 . cacay a malebut siwa a lasubu sepat a bataan idaw ku lima (1945) a mihcaan, Su lan pasayda i Dun ou paculi, u Potsdam nika sasulitan tu Czechoslovakia namaka Prague nutipan hitay nu Amilika midebung, mapulung tu sudu Prague hiyan nu Su lan a hitay madebung, Czechia atu Slovakia mapulung aca, kelican nu Germany atu Cun yali ku lala' misabaluhayaca mibenis tu Czechoslovakia , nika Zakarpattia Oblast sipakelic i Soviet Union a Ukrainian Soviet Socialist Republic . 1946 5 , 38.6 . cacay a malebut siwaw a lasubu sepat a bataan idaw ku enem (1946) a mihcaan lima a bulat, Czechoslovakia itini i United States Soviet Union miliyas satu salihalay satu kunuheni misingkiw, kuncendan sayadahay ku nisingkiwan a paya tulu a bataan idaw ku walu tin enem a kilac( 38.6 ), amica kuncendan ku satabakiay nu dan nika micukelay a tademaw caay ka papina, nika mihantaya tu kuncendan a pinapinanu centan caay ka balud ku balucu'. 1948 5 . sakatusa a mihcaan, Slovakia nuudip a kawaw caay henay ka hedaek,sakaudip kangelu' an macunus kunikacaay ka hulak nu kawaw nika itini i Stalin mipenec makai tunipipadan nu United States , nina kuncendan sifu caay kanamuhi nu tademaw kaisa miduiy itini i cacay a malebut siw a lasubut sepat a bataan idaw ku walu (1948) a mihcaan lima a bulad miliyawaca misingkiw. 2 . nika tawyaay a mihcaan nu tusa a bulad, kasaupu nu sifu a dumaan nu tan a sakakaay patahekal tu sapiales, midademec tu kuncendan misa tabaki tu kincal misilud tu kakawawen, sisa mapalekal ku cence kabaliyawan, kuncendan masakaputay miawaw tu katuuday muculil palekal miyukiw tina kawawan. . imahini u sakakaay katepaan i dadan a mapatay, katuuday sakamusa cinida niuculan nu sifu mipacuk, mahida tuwaca kuncendan palekal mibabelih, unuheni mikuwan tu aydaay nipisingkiwan, amica ku cungli caay sipaliyuni nika sifu mamin tu u kuncendan kusi kawaway. 1948 . . nika itini i cacay a malebut siwa a lasubu sepat a bataan idaw ku walu (1948) a mihcaan tusa a bulad ninakawaw sa, mala Sulan a binawlan nu sehuw cui a kanatal, micumud tu Soviet Union patideng tu huasa sasulitan anikasakaput atu sakaudip papadang a wiyunhuw. 1960 . cacay a malebut siwa a lasubu enem a bataan (1960) a mihcaan Czechoslovakia misumad tu ngangan u Czechoslovak malabinawlanay a sakaputan nu kunhekuo . 1968 . cacay a malebut siwa a lasubu enem a bataan idaw kuwalu (1968) a mihcaan, tawyaay a Czechoslovakia kun cen dan sakacacaya a mikawaway ci Du'pu cieke palekal tu " pulake a satingsing " a sakaudip atu cence' misumada a laylayan, u Sulen caay ka namuh, Sulen midebung tu Slovakia milawlaw, pulake a satingsing namisumad tu laylay hatinitu sa, ciekun sakakaay ci Tupucieke' dakepen patayda i Moscow , Sulan a wayway kahiyaan nu kitakit sasakamuensa nu katuuday. 1989 11 1990 . cacay a malebut siwa a lasubu walu a bataan idaw ku siwa (1989) a mihcaan cacay a bataan idaw ku cacay a bulad, Czechoslovakia milaheci ku Sezun a kawaw mahedek tu ku kuncen dan misataaday a centan, cacay a malebut siwa a lasubu siwa a bataan (1990) a mihcaan, kanatal a ngangan misumad han u Czechia atu Slovakia lanpan kunhe
